description:
This Bubble.io plugin integrates comprehensive Pok√©mon data retrieval into your Bubble.io app, leveraging the Pok√©API to provide detailed information and evolution insights for any Pok√©mon of your choice.

[b]Features[/b]
üî• Fetches detailed Pok√©mon species data, including evolution chains  
üî• Determines and displays the evolution stage of the selected Pok√©mon  
üî• Retrieves essential stats such as HP, types, attacks, and National Pok√©dex ID  
üî• Seamless integration with Bubble.io for dynamic state management and event triggering  
üî• Handles API errors gracefully with customizable fallback events  
üî• Minimal configuration for quick and efficient setup

plugin_instructions:
